TestDescription.name: Umbraco CMS remote code execution
TestDescription.Description: Umbraco CMS version 4.7.0 is vulnerable to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can upload files via an unsecured web service located at /umbraco/webservices/codeEditorSave.asmx (method [bold]SaveDLRScript[/bold]). Acunetix WVS created a file named [bold]testAcunetix.test[/bold] to test for this vulnerability.
TestDescription.Impact: An unauthenticated attacker can execute arbitrary code on the affected server.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Umbraco CMS.

Reference.database: Find Bugs Faster With A WebMatrix Local Reference Instance
